reviewText: I confess to being a Mametophile, one of the oddballs addicted to his quirky dialogue.  "Heist" is the only reason I bought this, and I am certainly glad I did.  Gene Hackman?  Danny DeVito?  Sam Rockwell?  Ricky Jay?  Rebecca Pidgeon?  Delroy Lindo?  I could listen to these guys read Mamet forever....
